2 Why Crafts Crafting can be a relaxing and enriching activity. Crafting is a wonderful creative outlet to channel emotions and reduce stress. This book will introduce several different kinds of crafts: - fiber arts - knitting - crochet - needlework - embroidery - cross stitch
